card.name: Arhat of Unbidden Lessons
card.text: When Arhat of Unbidden Lessons enters, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sentry Post
card.text: When Sentry Post enters, create two 2/2 black Drone artifact creature tokens with "This creature can't block." {4}{W}, {T}: Return Sentry Post to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Lesser-Chariot Vassal
card.text: Lesser-Chariot Vassal has first strike during your turn. When Lesser-Chariot Vassal dies, create a 2/2 black Drone artifact creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Ascendant Art - Form of Forms
card.text: Championed (When you cast this spell, copy it if it targets a Hero or a creature with power 4 or greater. You may choose new targets for the copy.) Untap target creature. Until end of turn, it becomes a 3/3 Elemental with vigilance.

card.name: Hard Bargain
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Create a tapped token that's a copy of target token you control.

card.name: Griefspear Ascendant
card.text: Griefspear Ascendant enters with a Weapon token attached to it. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.) {3}{U}: Griefspear Ascendant can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Hesitation
card.text: Flying When Hesitation enters, you may return an artifact or creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, return an artifact or creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Concordance Appraisal
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if an artifact you controlled died this turn. Draw two cards.

card.name: Countervail
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target creature spell. • Tap target creature. Put three stun counters on it.

card.name: Ascendant Art - Everstasis
card.text: Championed (When you cast this spell, copy it if it targets a Hero or a creature with power 4 or greater. You may choose new targets for the copy.) Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Put a menace counter on it.

card.name: Terrorcrown Ascendant
card.text: Menace Terrorcrown Ascendant enters with a Weapon token attached to it. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.)

card.name: Charnel-Alley Confessor
card.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Scry 1 if a nontoken permanent was sacrificed this way. Draw a card.

card.name: Glass-Needle Facsimile
card.text: When Glass-Needle Facsimile enters, create a 2/2 black Drone artifact creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Arhat's Mercy
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature you control gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn. • Each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Ceaseless Obstacles
card.text: When Ceaseless Obstacles enters, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. {4}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Ceaseless Obstacles: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Wrathstar Ascendant
card.text: Wrathstar Ascendant enters with a Weapon token attached to it. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.)

card.name: Arhat of Fraying Patience
card.text: Haste Artifact creatures and equipped creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Mantar-Am Freeglider
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Mantar-Am Freeglider attacks, if an artifact you controlled died this turn, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Ascendant Art - Soul As Ash
card.text: Championed (When you cast this spell, copy it if it targets a Hero or a creature with power 4 or greater. You may choose new targets for the copy.) Double the power of target creature you control until end of turn.

card.name: Training Montage
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or discard a card. Draw two cards. Training Montage deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Arhat of Ephemeral Gifts
card.text: When Arhat of Ephemeral Gifts enters, create a token that's a copy of a token you control. If you created a Weapon token this way, attach it to target creature you control.

card.name: Waymark Eviscerator
card.text: Waymark Eviscerator can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Enter Malichai
card.text: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If that card is a Forest, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Charnel Pickpocket
card.text: Deathtouch {T}, Sacrifice another nonland, nontoken permanent: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Ascendant Art - Horizon's Eye
card.text: Championed (When you cast this spell, copy it if it targets a Hero or a creature with power 4 or greater. You may choose new targets for the copy.) When target creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Wayside Atlas
card.text: Whenever you attack, target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Altar of Harmonious Spheres
card.text: When Altar of Harmonious Spheres enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put up to one creature or land card from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {T}: Add {C}. You can't spend this mana to cast noncreature spells.

card.name: Windscythe Ascendant
card.text: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Windscythe Ascendant enters with a Weapon token attached to it. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.)

card.name: Shadows in the Way
card.text: Whenever Shadows in the Way or a nontoken artifact you control enters, create a 2/2 black Drone artifact creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Aeon-Tested Polearm
Ironspark Ascendant
card.text: Ironspark Ascendant enters with two Weapon tokens attached to it. (They're Equipment artifacts with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.) {3}, {T}, Unattach an Equipment from a Hero you control: That Equipment becomes a 3/3 Toy artifact creature with trample. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Time to Reflect
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. That token enters tapped with two stun counters on it.

card.name: Demiurge's Graces
card.text: Create two Weapon tokens. (They're Equipment artifacts with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.) Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards by sacrificing an artifact in addition to paying their other costs.

card.name: Swornspine Ascendant
card.text: Swornspine Ascendant enters with a Weapon token attached to it. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.) Spells you cast or abilities you activate that target Heroes you control cost {1} less to cast and can't be countered.

card.name: Utter Conquest
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each nonland permanent you control. Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Inadequacy
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack, if you control two or more attacking creatures, you may sacrifice one of those creatures. If you do, return Inadequacy from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Pulse of the Ashen Capital
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's 1/1 and has haste. Exile that token at end of turn.

card.name: Thorn-Petal Halo
Immaculate Ledger
Cylothyne, Never-Named
card.text: Cylothyne enters with a Weapon token attached to them. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.) Whenever an enchanted or equipped creature you control attacks, defending player may have it gain indestructible until end of turn. If they don't, it gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Cleaver of the Last Path
card.text: Vigilance, menace Whenever one or more artifact tokens you control enter, you may pay {2}. When you do, those tokens become copies of Cleaver of the Last Path. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Road's End
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a creature with one or more permanents attached to it. The same is true for a Hero. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Royal Foundry's Roar
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Artifact spells you cast this way cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Arhat of the Final Word
card.text: Flash Flying, vigilance When Arhat of the Final Word enters, counter target spell. Its controller searches their library for a card that shares a card type with that spell, reveals it, puts it into their hand, then shuffles.

card.name: Willwrought Ascendant
card.text: Willwrought Ascendant enters with two Weapon tokens attached to it. (They're Equipment artifacts with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.) {T}, Sacrifice a token: Scry 1, then draw a card.
